original_text: Then I would show that paper clearly on my shoulders. I would be proud to wear it like a crown on my head. Then I would show that paper clearly on my shoulders. I would be proud to wear it like a crown on my head. Then I would show that paper clearly on my shoulders. I would be proud to wear it like a crown on my head. Then I would show that paper clearly on my shoulders.
korean_text: 내가 그것을 어깨에 메기도 하고 왕관처럼 머리에 쓰기도 하리라

sentences.original_text: Then I would show that paper clearly on my shoulders
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 그 종이를 명확히 내 어깨에 보여주겠습니다

sentences.original_text: I would be proud to wear it like a crown on my head
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그것을 머리에 왕관처럼 쓰는 것을 자랑스럽게 생각할 것입니다

sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 그 종이를 명확히 내 어깨에 보여주겠습니다
